Title: Relates to foundation aid payable in the two thousand twenty-one--two thousand twenty-two school year
Summary: Sets the minimum amount of the foundation aid payable in the two thousand twenty-one--two thousand twenty-two school year at the total foundation aid base, plus the positive difference, if any, of the product of total foundation aid and seven-tenths (0.7) less the total foundation aid base.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to foundation aid payable in the two thousand twenty-one--two thousand twenty-two school year
